inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of pituitary adenoma on pre-operative MRI
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients less than 18 years of age
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: diagnosis other than that of pituitary adenoma on pre-operative MRI e.g., meningioma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: unable to provide consent e.g., mental illness or later withdrawing consent.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 41-year-old man with Acromegaly, underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. Lab studies show IGF-1 level of 4.5 ULN adjusted by sex and age.
